titles.title: Military Spouse Relocation and Contract Reimbursement Act
Military Spouse Relocation and Contract Reimbursement Act
A bill to authorize use of amounts in My Career Advancement Account Program accounts for fines for breaking employment contracts in connection with permanent changes of station.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Military Spouse Relocation and Contract Reimbursement Act
This bill authorizes reimbursements from the My Career Advancement Account Program account of a military spouse to pay fines imposed by an employer for breaking an employment contract in connection with the spouse's relocation due to a permanent change of station.
